name: Mini Haunters
description:
The Haunted Attraction that you work for has become REAL! Get through the Haunt and fight your way back to the real world! With a finger blistering Hardcore/Metalcore/Industrial soundtrack and teeth-crackingly difficulty that will troll you until the very end! 

A FRUSTRATINGLY fun little game! This is a very early version that will take you through Mr. Bright-Eyes's adventure! Can you get Bright-Eyes to the final trap, the impossible BLADESTORM?! Good luck, you'll need it! Enjoy!

The final game will have ten characters to play and 5 levels each!
